short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple browser extension for orchestrating PS (problem solving) sessions. Extended from Tomato Clock project.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
OfferFit PS Assistant is a simple browser extension used for orchestrating PS (problem solving) sessions, a productivity technique used to collaborate in an efficient and decision-oriented manner.

Features:

- Three problem solving lengths (customizable)
- "Read", "Discuss" and "Summarize" steps

This project is an extension of the Tomato Clock open source project.
